description: Details of Contamination part pursuant to condition no.15 (b+c) of planning permission ref.174205RMS dated 29.03.2018 for 'Reserved matters application for Phase 9.1 of the Acton Gardens masterplan detailing Landscaping, Appearance, Scale, Access and Layout in relation to the construction of one apartment building varying between four storeys and six storeys in height and containing 68 new residential units (18 x 1 Bedroom, 37 x 2 Bedroom and 13 x 3 Bedroom); associated private and semi-private amenity space, refuse/recycling storage; plant rooms, car parking; loading area; works to the public highway and public realm improvements, following the demolition of Webb Court and Bennet Court, and tree removal; application made part pursuant to Conditions 2 (Reserved Matters) and 4 (Reserved Matters) of outline planning permission reference P/2012/0708 dated 13/08/2013 (amended by minor material amendment application PP/2014/2142 dated 21/07/2014, PP/2014/6303 dated 31/03/15 and 160794VAR dated 09/12/2016)'
